First, the variables:

program main

    implicit none

    integer*8 :: A, B, K, x, y

    character(len=20) :: s_x, s_y

    character(len=41) :: s

    integer :: n

    integer*8, parameter :: M = 1000000007

    ! Read input

    read*, A, B, K

    ! Compute x and y

    x = A - K

    y = B

    if (x < 0) then

        y = B + x

        x = 0

        if (y < 0) then

            y = 0

        end if

    end if

    ! Form the string s

    write(s_x, '(I0)') x

    write(s_y, '(I0)') y

    s = trim(s_x) // ' ' // trim(s_y)

    n = len_trim(s)

    ! Initialize DP array

    integer*8, dimension(n+1, 2) :: dp

    dp = 0

    dp(1,1) = 1

    ! Process each character

    integer :: i

    character(1) :: current_char

    do i = 1, n

        current_char = s(i:i)

        if (current_char == '0') then

            dp(i+1,1) = dp(i,1)

            dp(i+1,2) = dp(i,2)

        else

            dp(i+1,2) = mod( dp(i,1) + dp(i,2), M )

        end if

        ! Second part of the loop

        if (current_char == '0') then

            dp(i+1,2) = mod( dp(i+1,2) + 2*dp(i,2), M )

        else

            dp(i+1,1) = mod( dp(i+1,1) + 2*dp(i,1), M )

            dp(i+1,2) = mod( dp(i+1,2) + 2*dp(i,2), M )

        end if

    end do

    ! Compute the result

    integer*8 :: result

    result = mod( dp(n+1,1) + dp(n+1,2), M )

    print*, result

end program main
